Manifest.name: EKSTASIS
Manifest.title: EKSTASIS - MADRID TECHNO RAVES
Manifest.description: EKSTASIS no es solo una fiesta; es un llamado a reconectar con la esencia de la música electrónica y la cultura rave.
Manifest.keywords: rave Madrid, hard techno, techno warehouse, escena underground

NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.subtitle: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you were looking for.

faq1.question: How can I get tickets?
faq1.answer: Tickets are available through Resident Advisor. Follow us on social media to know when they go live.

faq2.question: Where are the events?
faq2.answer: You'll receive the exact location 12 hours before the event via the same email you used to buy your ticket. If you don't receive it, feel free to contact us via Instagram or email.

faq3.question: What does 'BYOB' mean?
faq3.answer: Bring Your Own Bottle. You're welcome to bring your favorite drink and mix. We'll provide cups and ice.

faq4.question: What's the minimum age requirement?
faq4.answer: You must be at least 18 years old to attend.

faq5.question: Is there a dress code?
faq5.answer: NO. Feel free to come as you are.

Help.description: At EKS.TA.SIS we’re here to support you whenever we can. You can always contact us.

Subscribe.titleHTML: STAY UPDATED! TICKET DROP AND NEWS
